com.qtplaf.library.util.xml

Class XMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.util.xml.XMLWriter

  • public class XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to write XML files.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • printTagWithOptions

        public void printTagWithOptions(java.lang.String tag,
                                boolean emptyTag,
                                boolean attributesNewLine,
                                XMLAttribute... attributes)
        Print a tag with attributes and control options.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to print.
        emptyTag - A boolean that indicates whether the tag is empty, ie it has no children.
        attributesNewLine - A boolean that indicates whether attributes should be printed in a new line.
        attributes - The list of attributes.

      • printTagWithOptions

        attributes - The list of attributes.
